paragraphs.text:
%md
This demo contains a more advanced ui-element.
The football field is renderd with d3js and dispays the current player possition (positions of the sensors) in realtime.

%md
#### Load datasource into a flink datastream

result.msg:

import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.TimeCharacteristic

<style>
    .line {
        fill: none;
        stroke: #000;
        stroke-width: 1.5px;
    }
    .block{
        height: 300px;
        display: block;
    }
</style>

<script>
zeppelin.addComponent(
    "i2FootballField",
    "<?xml version='1.0' standalone='no?'>"+ 
"<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC '-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN' "+ 
  "'http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd'>"+ 
  "<svg width='1268px' height='808px' viewBox='0 0 1150 720' stroke='white' version='1.1'"+
"     xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'>"+
"    <rect x='0' y='0' width='1150' height='720' fill='green' />"+
"    <path d='M 575,20 L 50,20 50,700 1100,700 1100,20 575,20 575,700 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill='green' />"+
"    <circle cx='575' cy='360' r='91.5' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <circle cx='575' cy='360' r='2' stroke='white' fill='white' />"+
"    <circle cx='160' cy='360' r='2' stroke='white' fill='white' />"+
"    <circle cx='990' cy='360' r='2' stroke='white' fill='white' />"+
"    <path d='M 50,324.4 L 40,324.4 40, 396.6 50 396.6 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <path d='M 1100,324.4 L 1110,324.4 1110,396.6 1100,396.6 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <path d='M 50,269.4 L 105,269.4 105,451.6 50 451.6 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <path d='M 1100,269.4 L 1045,269.4 1045,451.6 1100,451.6 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <path d='M 50,159.4 L 215,159.4 215,561.6 50 561.6 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <path d='M 1100,159.4 L 935,159.4 935,561.6 1100,561.6 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <path d='M 215,286.875 A 91.5,91.5 0 0,1 215,433.125 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill='green' />"+
"    <path d='M 935,286.875 A 91.5,91.5 0 0,0 935,433.125 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill='green' />"+
"    <path d='M 50,30 A 10,10 0 0,0 60,20 L 50,20 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <path d='M 60,700 A 10,10 0 0,0 50,690 L 50,700 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <path d='M 1100,690 A 10,10 0 0,0 1090,700 L 1100,700 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"    <path d='M 1090,20 A 10,10 0 0,0 1100,30 L 1100,20 z' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' fill-opacity='0' />"+
"</svg>", 
    function(scope, element) {
       
        element.addClass('block');
        
        var points = []
        
        var scale = 0.7;
        var dataTopLeftX = 0;
        var dataWidth = 52489;
        var dataTopLeftY = -33960;
        var dataHeight = 67930;

        viewHeight = 690;
        viewWidth = 1050;
    
        var svg = d3.select($(element).children("svg")[0])
        
        var sidsTeamA = [13,14,97,98,47,16,49,88,19,52,53,54,23,24,57,58,59,28]
        var sidsTeamB = [61,62,99,100,63,64,65,66,67,68,69,38,71,40,73,74,75,44]
        
        function unitsPerPixel() {
            return {
                width: dataHeight / viewWidth,
                height: dataWidth / viewHeight
            }
        }

        function mapPoint(point) {
            var unitPerPixcel = unitsPerPixel()
            return {
                y: ((point.x) / unitPerPixcel.height)+15,
                x: ((point.y + 33960) / unitPerPixcel.width ) +50,
            }
        }
        
        var requested = false;
        
        function addPoint(point) {
            var cordinates = mapPoint(point);
            var id = point.id;
            if(points[id] == undefined)
                points[id] = point
             points[id].cordinates = cordinates;
        }
        
        var stop = false;
        function draw() {
          
          for(var i = 0; i<points.length;i++){
            if(points[i] != undefined){
                var point = points[i];
                if(point.svg == undefined){
                    point.svg = svg.append("circle")
                                .attr("r", 10)
                                .attr("id", i)
                                .style("fill", getColor(point));
                }
                point.svg
                        .attr("cx", point.cordinates.x)
                        .attr("cy", point.cordinates.y)
            }
          }
        }
        
        function isBallEvent(point){
            return point.id==4 || point.id==8 || point.id==10 || point.id== 12;
        }
        
        function isTeamA(event){
            return  sidsTeamA.indexOf(event.id)!=-1;
        }
        
         function isTeamB(event){
            return  sidsTeamB.indexOf(event.id)!=-1;
        }
        
        function getColor(event){
            if(isBallEvent(event)){
                return "white"
            }
            else if(isTeamA(event)){
                 return "blue"
            }else if(isTeamB(event)){
                 return "orange"
            }
            else{
                return "black"
            }
        }
        
        var init = false;
        var remove = scope.$watch('players', function(newPoinsts, oldValue) {
            console.log(newPoinsts)
            if(newPoinsts!=undefined)
                newPoinsts.forEach(function(newPoinst){
                    addPoint({id:newPoinst._1,x:newPoinst._2,y:newPoinst._3})
                })
             window.requestAnimationFrame(draw); 
        });
        
        // We have to clean-up, if the ui-element is reloaded
        scope.$on('clean', function() {
            remove()
            stop = true;
        });
       
    })
</script>

import scala.collection.JavaConverters._
import org.apache.zeppelin.flink.ui._
import org.apache.zeppelin.flink.FlinkInterpreter
defined class FootballFieldUi

paragraphs.text:
%flink 
import org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.assigners._;

var time = TumblingProcessingTimeWindows.of(Time.milliseconds(100));
debsItemDataStream
    .keyBy("sid")
    .window(time)
    .maxBy("ts")
    .map(x=>(x.sid,x.x,x.y))
    .windowAll(time)
    .fold(List.empty[(Int, Int, Int)]) { (acc, v) =>  v :: acc}
    .addSink(i2FootballField.getSink())
